title: Conduct a Routine Property Inspection
description: A property manager conducts a semi-annual inspection of a rented property to check for maintenance issues and lease violations.

tasks.description: Provide the tenant with the legally required notice before entering the property.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal notice of entry is delivered to the tenant.

tasks.description: Conduct the inspection using a digital checklist, documenting the condition of the property with photos.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed inspection report is completed.

tasks.description: If any tenant-caused damage or required maintenance is found, create a work order or issue a notice to the tenant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Any identified issues are formally documented and addressed.
